column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hello Brandon - Thank you for your review. We're never going to be all things to all people
column2: but we do take customer satisfaction seriously. Please know that you can always inform your server if you're not 100% satisfied with any of our food for any reason. He or she will gladly offer something else that might suit your palate
column3: replace the item or remove it from your tab. We offer a variety of ramens at JINYA
column4: and we have found that certain ramen combinations suit people very differently. There's definitely no one-size-fits-all. Regardless
